events.title: Applications open!
events.description: We're welcoming any and all students who are looking to make a difference through tech. Applicants are not considered on a rolling basis.

events.title: Coffee Chats open
events.description: Reach out to our members to learn more about the team.

events.title: Information Session 1
events.description: Come join us for a session to learn about DTI, our goals, and our subteams. There will be time to chat with DTI members of all roles after! And if you can't make this session, check out the Information Session 2 below.

events.title: Club Fest
events.description: Meet us at Cornell's semesterly ClubFest with over 900+ diverse undergraduate student organizations!

events.title: Information Session 2
events.description: Another session to learn about DTI and to chat with our members. All applicants are encouraged to attend one of the information sessions.

events.title: Applications due
events.description: We're welcoming any and all students who are looking to make a difference through tech. Applicants are not considered on a rolling basis.

events.title: Behavioral Interviews
events.description: Prepare to talk about past projects, teamwork experiences, and your motivation for joining DTI.

events.title: Technical Interviews
events.description: Demonstrate your technical skills through problem-solving challenges relevant to your subteam.
